item.description:
**Please Note: This event is not hosted by our group and we are not in charge of it - if you have any questions about the contest or the event please contact either of the following people:
Hartford Area - Jennifer Ford 860-677-9737 x 6017
Fairfield Area - Eric Lambert 203-335-2177

Annual Out of Home Creative Competition
DATE: Thursday, February 26, 2009
TIME: 5:30PM – 8:00PM
LOCATION: Park Road Playhouse
COST: $10 Pre-registered Members / $20 Non-Members or at the door / $5
Students

This is a reception that marks the end of the competition. Anyone can enter the competition and you can submit as many entries as you want. First place winners receive $150! Second place, $50; third place, $25.

The doors will open at 5:30pm and all of the entries will be on display.
Beer and wine will be free on a first come - first serve basis. Cash
donations will be gratefully accepted.

Industry experts will evaluate the entries during the event. We’
ll announce a winner at the end of the evening. THE WINNING BILLBOARD WILL
BE ON DISPLAY ON DIGITAL BILLBOARDS IN THE STATE.

Visit the following link for contest rules and submission guidelines:
http://www.adclubct.o...

If you have any questions about the contest, please contact the following people:
Hartford Area - Jennifer Ford 860-677-9737 x 6017
Fairfield Area - Eric Lambert 203-335-2177
item.name: Annual Out-of-Home Creative Competition
